seo.title: Botox® in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Quick, no-downtime Botox® by NP/RN injectors for soft, natural results. Book in Westfield or Carmel. Honest dosing, follow-ups, and member pricing.

overview.p1: Botox® is a quick, no-downtime treatment that softens frown lines, forehead lines, and crow’s feet so you look rested—not “frozen.” Tiny injections relax the overactive muscles that create creases, with improvements appearing in a few days and full results at about two weeks. Most people describe it as a few small pinches, and then they’re back to work, errands, or the gym.
overview.p2: At RELUXE, your visit starts with a friendly, honest consult. We map your unique expressions, discuss goals and budget, and create a plan that keeps your features natural and balanced. You’ll leave with simple aftercare tips and a clear timeline for touch-ups (typically every 3–4 months, depending on your muscles and metabolism).

whyReluxe.title: Expert injectors & providers
whyReluxe.body: Care by an anatomy-focused Nurse Practitioner and trained injectors who customize dosing for your face, lifestyle, and goals.

whyReluxe.title: Personalized dosing & plans
whyReluxe.body: We map movement/skin and tailor treatment for results that actually last.

whyReluxe.title: Membership value
whyReluxe.body: Best pricing on Botox & all complementary services for results you can maintain.

whyReluxe.title: The RELUXE experience
whyReluxe.body: Easy booking, zero-pressure consults, and real follow-up care.

howItWorks.title: Consult & Map
howItWorks.body: We assess movement, anatomy, and goals.

flexEverything.intro: Small, precise doses customized to your muscle pattern.

items.heading: Get the right dose
items.body: Everyone is different & our expert nurse injectors will help you get the perfect dose.

items.heading: Pairing tips
items.body: Lip flip, masseter slimming, skin resurfacing or facial balancing.

faq.a: Botox is an FDA-approved injectable that relaxes targeted muscles to smooth wrinkles and prevent new ones from forming.
No—our approach preserves natural movement while softening lines.
You’ll start to notice changes in 3–5 days, with full results in about 2 weeks
Typically 3+ months, but it can vary for each person.
No major downtime — you can return to normal activities right after, but avoid exercise for 24 hours and lying flat or rubbing the area for 4 hours.

faq.q: How much does it cost? How many units will I need?
faq.a: Botox typically priced per unit. At RELUXE, we offer Botox at $14/unit and membership pricing for $10/unit for predictable costs.

Because it gives you the best results and the best value. We believe the right dose lasts longer, loyal clients deserve our best Botox pricing, and pairing treatments with pro skincare delivers the most youthful, healthy skin — so our members save on every service, every product, every time.

faq.q: Can I pair Botox with other treatments?
faq.a: Absolutely — it pairs beautifully with dermal fillers, facials, and laser treatments for a more complete rejuvenation. Order is important, so our team can help ensure you get the best result!

resultsGallery.alt: Forehead lines before/after – smoother after 2 weeks

testimonials.author: Jennifer S.
testimonials.text: The whole visit was so easy—and I loved my results! Krista was incredibly gentle and explained everything step-by-step.
